process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Our Process
process.heroTitle: From Idea to Launch: A Transparent Roadmap to Your Success

step1.title: Discovery & Strategy
step1.subtitle: Understanding Your "Why"
step1.description: Our partnership begins not with code, but with questions. We conduct in-depth workshops to understand your business goals, target audience, and core challenges. This stage is about building a shared vision and defining what success looks like.

step2.title: Architecture & Design
step2.subtitle: Building the Foundation
step2.description: Once we understand the 'why', we design the 'how'. We create a robust technical blueprint (architecture) that ensures your product is scalable, secure, and maintainable. This is followed by user-centric UI/UX design to create an intuitive and engaging experience.

step3.title: Agile Development & Feedback
step3.subtitle: Building With You, Not Just For You
step3.description: Development is an iterative, transparent process. We work in 2-week 'sprints', at the end of which you get a live demo of the progress. This constant feedback loop ensures the final product is exactly what you need, with no surprises.

step4.title: Launch & Partnership
step4.subtitle: The Beginning, Not The End
step4.description: Our job isn't done at launch. We provide ongoing support, performance monitoring, and strategic guidance to ensure your product continues to evolve and deliver value. Your success is our success.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Let's turn your vision into reality. Schedule a free consultation to discuss your project and see how our process can work for you.

why_us.FEATURE_1_TEXT: Our goal is not just to write code. We build systems that directly impact your business outcomes, whether it's reducing costs or increasing sales.
why_us.FEATURE_2_TEXT: Experience with large-scale, corporate systems teaches one thing: reliability isn't a feature, it's the foundation. Every CodeNovex project is built with this same enterprise-level engineering discipline, where security and stability are never optional.
why_us.FEATURE_3_TEXT: Working with CodeNovex means you're gaining a technology partner, not just a contractor, who is personally invested in your long-term success.
why_us.PRICING_TEXT: A fixed-price project model eliminates budget uncertainty. You'll receive a detailed proposal with clear milestones, deliverables, and ROI projections before any commitment. Most clients see positive returns within 6-12 months of launch.
why_us.PRICING_BOX: CodeNovex stays ahead of the technology curve so your business stays competitive. Continuous R&D means you benefit from cutting-edge solutions like AI integration and cloud-native architecture - without the enterprise price tag.

team.WHO_WE_ARE_TEXT: CodeNovex was founded on a single principle: technology must solve a business problem, not just complete a task. This philosophy grew from direct experience with enterprise-level, mission-critical systems, where one lesson became clear: project success is determined not by the complexity of the code, but by the clarity of the strategy and the strength of the architecture. That is why the CodeNovex approach focuses not on 'what' to build, but on 'why' it's being built and 'how' to build it right.
team.FOUNDER_TEXT: My personal mission is to help businesses turn technology into their most powerful tool. My experience with mission-critical, enterprise-level systems is the guarantee that your project will be reliable and ready for growth.

services.WHAT_WE_DO_TEXT: We translate your business needs into technology tools that deliver results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your most common questions about our process and philosophy.
faq.ctaSubtitle: We're here to help. Reach out and let's discuss your project.

questions.question: What's the difference between a website and a web application?
questions.answer: A website is typically a digital brochure-it provides information. A web application is a tool-it performs a specific task: automating a process, managing data, calculating a price, etc.

questions.question: Why don't you have a fixed price list?
questions.answer: Because we don't sell off-the-shelf products. Every business is unique, and so are its challenges. It's like asking, 'How much does it cost to build a house?'. The price depends on the size, materials, and complexity. Our 'Discovery' phase is dedicated to creating that blueprint, after which you receive a precise, transparent investment plan.

questions.question: How long does a project typically take?
questions.answer: The timeline directly depends on the project's complexity. A simple system might take a few weeks, while a complex platform could take several months. Our agile, 2-week sprint system ensures that you see consistent progress and the process is fully predictable.

questions.question: Do you offer support after the project is launched?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. Our partnership doesn't end at launch. CodeNovex offers ongoing technical support, development, and strategic guidance to ensure your product continues to meet evolving business needs. We are committed to your long-term success.

questions.question: What technology stack do you use?
questions.answer: CodeNovex is tech-agnostic, meaning we choose the best tool for the job, not just our favorite tool. However, our core expertise lies in modern technologies like React/Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. The guiding principle is simple: the technology must serve the business goal, not the other way around.

legal.privacyContent:
At CodeNovex, we respect your privacy. This document explains what limited information we collect and how we use it.

**What information do we collect?**
The only personal information we collect is what you voluntarily provide through our contact form (name, email, company name, message).

**How do we use this information?**
We use this information for the sole purpose of responding to your inquiry and communicating with you about your project.

**Data Sharing**
We will never sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties.
